scripts.do-changelog: bun run changelog && git add ./changelog.md ./package.json && git commit -m "BLD: Release v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" --no-verify
scripts.post-v: bun run do-changelog && git tag v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && git push --no-verify && git push --tags --no-verify
scripts.bump-major: bun run pre-v && npm version major --no-workspaces-update --no-git-tag-version && bun run post-v
scripts.bump-minor: bun run pre-v && npm version minor --no-workspaces-update --no-git-tag-version && bun run post-v
scripts.bump-patch: bun run pre-v && npm version patch --no-workspaces-update --no-git-tag-version && bun run post-v
scripts.bump-prerelease: bun run pre-v && npm version prerelease --no-workspaces-update --no-git-tag-version && bun run post-v
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && bun bun.build.ts && bun run dts && bun run bundle-types
